data.text: @tttliveonline All restrictions should be lifted with the exception of having to wear masks in public indoor spaces. We have community spread of the disease, so we can't really stop the spread anymore. We need to manage the risks while getting back to normal.
@tttliveonline Good but can we exercise on the roads without masks?
@M_Miller3420 @tttliveonline Damn right remove them all, there are no victims of someone does not wear a mask and that should not be a crime
@VWharwood @tttliveonline Mask bigotry ramps up. Masks mandate to stay for under-privileged people. https://t.co/BizEPo2DW0
@tttliveonline Mask bigotry ramps up. Masks mandate to stay for under-privileged people. https://t.co/PoPcFjpVFE
